summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2013 ELEMENT TRAVEL TRAILER. THE CONTACT STATED THAT WHILE DRIVING 50 MPH, THE HITCHING PIN DETACHED FROM THE VEHICLE, THE AIR CONDITIONING FAILED TO BLOW COOL AIR, THE CONTROL PANEL FAIL TO OPERATE, AND THE CONTACT SMELLED PROPANE EMERGING FROM THE VEHICLE. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO THE DEALER AND REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOTIFIED OF THE FAILURES. THE APPROXIMATE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 43,000.
